challenge.title: Introduction to Understanding the Quran
challenge.description: A concise introduction to understanding the Quran, featuring three essential lectures by Dr. Israr Ahmed. This short series covers the fundamental concepts and importance of studying the Quran, perfect for beginners.
challenge.purpose: To provide a quick and essential introduction to understanding the Quran for beginners

videos.title: Introduction to Quran Tafseer Series
videos.description: An essential introduction to understanding the Quran, covering the importance and methodology of studying the Quran

videos.title: Understanding the Quran - Basic Concepts
videos.description: Learn the fundamental concepts and principles of understanding the Quran

videos.title: The Importance of Quranic Knowledge
videos.description: Understanding why learning the Quran is essential for every Muslim
